pr_title: Fix issue when updating resources in REST APIs created from WSDL

timeline.message: Update sequences of APIs created from WSDL when swagger is updated
Fix issue when adding new resources to SOAP to REST APIs
Fix issue when modifying WSDL resources with path parameters

timeline.bodyText: What does this flag does? Hope if someone update the sequence it won't get affected.
timeline.author: harsha89

replies.bodyText:
When updating swagger definition, for REST APIs created from SOAP back-end, we need to update the the generated sequences. This flag is used to differentiate the APIs created from WSDL.
Yes, if someone updates the sequence directly, that won't get affected as it uses a different API - [1]
[1] https://github.com/wso2/carbon-apimgt/blob/master/components/apimgt/org.wso2.carbon.apimgt.rest.api.publisher.v1/src/main/java/org/wso2/carbon/apimgt/rest/api/publisher/v1/impl/ApisApiServiceImpl.java#L2695
replies.author: vithu30
